install.readme:
This will Install the [url=http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=1146]Site Integration Mod[/url] by LHVWB. This is the install process for SMF 1.1.6. If that is not your current SMF version then the Mod may not work, although it should work with SMF 1.1.x.
Language Translations for English and English UTF8 are included. Please make sure that the modification works for at least one of these languages. Otherwise the settings area will not display the settings for this Mod correctly.
I hope that you find this Mod useful, LHVWB

This will Uninstall the Site Integration MOD by LHVWB

upgrade.readme: There is no upgrading process for the Site Integration Mod. Please uninstall this version of the Mod and install the latest version. You will not lose any of your files or data.
